name: fortinet-fortiflex
label: Fortinet FortiFlex
description: FortiFlex allows you to automate tasks such as creating entitlements when integrating with cloud orchestration platforms.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: Specify the URL of the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.tooltip: Specify the username to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the username to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.tooltip: Specify the password to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the password to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.tooltip: Specify the ID of the client to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Specify the ID of the client to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of programs for a account from FortiFlex.
operations.title: Get All Program List

operations.description: Creates a new configuration under a specific program in FortiFlex based on the program serial number, configuration name, product type ID, and parameters that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Configuration

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Configuration Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the configuration based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the configuration based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Product Type
parameters.description: Select the product type for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
options: FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte Services

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: Number of CPUs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Select the number of CPUs for the selected product for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBCpuSize
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Select the number of CPUs for the selected product

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: Service Package
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Select the service package for the selected product for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBServicePackage
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Select the service package for the selected product

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: VDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Specify the number of VDOMs for the selected product for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBVDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Specify the number of VDOMs for the selected product. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 500.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: Number of CPUs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Specify the number of CPUs for the selected product for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Specify the number of CPUs for the selected product. Minimum is 1, Maximum is 96

parameters.name: productTypeId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type ID of the program based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: If "Account ID" not provided, create new configuration in the same account that API user belongs to otherwise it will create new configurations in that account.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of configurations for a program from FortiFlex based on the program serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Configuration List

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: If "Account ID" not provided, return all configurations of all tenant accounts under the organization otherwise it only return configurations of that account.

operations.description: Enables a specific configuration of a program in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID you have specified. Note: Enabling a configuration will affect all virtual machines created based on it.
operations.title: Enable Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to enable a configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to enable a configuration in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Disables a specific configuration of a program in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID you have specified. Note: Disabling a configuration will affect all virtual machines created based on it.
operations.title: Disable Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to disable a configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to disable a configuration in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Updates a existing configuration in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, configuration name, and parameters that you have specified. Note: Updating a configuration's parameters such as number of CPUS, will affect all virtual machines created based on it.
operations.title: Update Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to update a configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to update a configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Configuration Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the configuration based on which you want to update a configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the configuration based on which you want to update a configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Product Type
parameters.description: Select the product type for which you want to update a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.name: productTypeId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type ID of the program based on which you want to update a new configuration in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Creates a VM entitlements based on a configuration in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, description, count, folder path, and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Create VM Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Count
parameters.description: Specify the count value based on which you want to create a number of VM entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count value based on which you want to create a number of VM entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Folder Path
parameters.description: Specify the folder path based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.tooltip: Specify the folder path on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.description: Specify the brief description based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief description based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null it will use the Program's end date automatically.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to create a VM entitlements in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null it will use the Program's end date automatically.

operations.description: Creates a hardware entitlements based on a configuration in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, serial numbers, and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Hardware Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Serial Numbers
parameters.description: Specify the serial numbers based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex. You can specify multiple serial numbers as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: serialNumbers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial numbers based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex. You can specify multiple serial numbers as comma-separated values.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null it will use the Program's end date automatically.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null it will use the Program's end date automatically.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of existing entitlements for a configuration from FortiFlex based on the configuration ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Entitlement List

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

operations.description: Update an entitlements details in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, serial number, description and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Update Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.description: Specify the brief description based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief description based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to update an entitlements in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Stop an entitlement in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Stop Entitlement

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to stop an entitlement in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to stop an entitlement in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Reactivate an entitlement after being stopped in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Reactivate Entitlement

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to reactivate an entitlement in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to reactivate an entitlement in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Move serial numbers and entitlements managed by FortiFlex from one account to another.
operations.title: Transfer Entitlement

parameters.title: Source Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the account ID of the source based on which you want to move serial numbers and entitlements from one account to another in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: sourceAccountId
parameters.tooltip: "Source Account ID" and "Target Account ID" should belong to the same organization and API user should have access to both (permission scope).

parameters.title: Source Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the config ID of the source based on which you want to move serial numbers and entitlements from one account to another in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: sourceConfigId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the config ID of the source. Note: "Source Config ID" should belong to "Source Account ID".

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated serial numbers based on which you want to move serial numbers and entitlements from one account to another in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumbers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated serial numbers. Note: All serial numbers should belong to "Source Config ID"

parameters.title: Target Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the account ID of the target based on which you want to move serial numbers and entitlements from one account to another in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: targetAccountId
parameters.tooltip: "Source Account ID" and "Target Account ID" should belong to the same organization and API user should have access to both (permission scope).

parameters.title: Target Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the account ID of the target based on which you want to move serial numbers and entitlements from one account to another in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: targetConfigId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account ID of the target. Note: If "Target Config ID" is not provided, create a copy of source configuration in target account regardless of whether similar configuration already exists otherwise it belongs to "Target Account ID". Also, source configuration and target configuration should be the same product type. But they don't have to have same parameter values.

operations.description: Regenerate token for a VM in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Regenerate Token for VM

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number based on which you want to regenerate token for a VM in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number based on which you want to regenerate token for a VM in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves the total points consumed by one or more virtual machines in a date range in FortiFlex based on the serial number and datetime parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Point Usage for VM

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to points for a VM from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to points for a VM from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Start DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the start datetime based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: startDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start datetime based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve points for a VM from FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of groups from FortiFlex based on the account ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Group List

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve groups from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve groups from FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves first available token from FortiFlex based on the account ID and other input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get NextToken for Group

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the config based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the config based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Asset Folder Path
parameters.description: Specify the folder path of the asset based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.tooltip: Specify the folder path of the asset based on which you want to retrieve token from FortiFlex.
